name: Tunnel (TheCaptainBuster)
description:
You're stuck in a tunnel, and you have to find your way out by dodging the obstacles!

Note: You have to press the spacebar to prevent yourself from hitting the lava / obstacles

  • You have a maximum and initial health of 50 HP
  • Every time you hit a blue obstacle, you lose 5 HP
  • Every time you hit a pink obstacle, you lose 10 HP
  • If you collect a Heart, you get 5 HP
  • Lava is present on either side. If you touch the lava, you die.

Controls:

A or left arrow key to move left D or right arrow key to move right SpaceBar to move up
